backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing authorization, user profile storage, portfolio profile editing, and work item CRUD with ordering and video flags.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering portfolio sections, admin panel for owners, and global theming.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin interface with tabs for editing profile data and managing work items.
frontend/src/components/admin/LoginButto: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileEdi: Form for editing portfolio profile fields with validation, social link management, and backend sync.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkItemsE: Admin UI for listing, adding, deleting, and drag‑and‑drop reordering work items with video detection.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: Displays the profile’s bio and social links with animated reveal using intersection observers.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Static contact section showing phone, email, and Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer showing attribution and current year with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Header: Compact header contact bar with phone, email, and Instagram links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/IntroS: Hero intro section with animated text and a button that scrolls to the work section.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Sticky navigation bar tracking active section via IntersectionObserver with mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/WorkSe: Fetches and displays work items with animations, fallback skeletons, and empty state messaging.
Embeds a responsive iframe video for a detected provider.
frontend/src/components/work/WorkCard.ts: Card showing a work item’s title, optional video embed, description, and external link.
frontend/src/components/work/WorkGrid.ts: Grid layout that animates and renders a list of WorkCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin by calling actor.isOwner().
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Provides an IntersectionObserver-based hook to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkItems.ts: Fetches, merges, and sorts seeded and backend work items, and provides mutations to add, delete, and reorder them.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/src/lib/seedWorkItems.ts: Contains predefined fallback work items merged with backend data.
frontend/src/lib/videoProviders.ts: Detects video providers like YouTube or Vimeo from URLs and returns corresponding embed info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, fonts, radii, and custom keyframes, plus plugin imports for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to fixing work item loading and embedding YouTube videos in the My Work section.
